articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Samchon Catfish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Samchon Catfish Farm
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Samchon Catfish Farm and set forth the task to turn it into a world-level farm which put fish breeding on a Juche, scientific, intensive and industrial basis at the highest level.
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 He said that the Samchon Catfish Farm was built in the period of the Arduous March, forced march on the personal initiative of leader Kim Jong Il and under his meticulous care and one of his legacies left by him out of his patriotism.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the day when he was visiting the farm accompanying the leader, Kim Jong Un said still fresh in his memory was the tender-hearted leader who had a broad smile on his face, greatly pleased to see the farm capable of supplying tasty and nutritious catfish to service personnel and people.
					
					 He called on its officials and employees to boost the production of catfish, always remembering the noble desire of Kim Jong Il, and thus glorify his leadership exploits forever.
					
					 He went round different places of the farm to learn in detail about the production and management there and advanced tasks to be fulfilled to turn it into the one of the world level.
					
					 Noting that the area where the farm is located is the ideal one for breeding warm water catfish as it is the area famous for hot spring in the country, he underscored the need to turn it into a world famous catfish production base.
					
					 It is necessary to carry out an ambitious and bold project for consolidating the material and technical foundation of the farm by building more hatcheries and indoor and outdoor ponds as well as a modern food production base so as to remarkably increase the production capacity of the farm on the basis of a scientific and economic calculation, he stressed.
					
					 He underscored the need to build a new reservoir with large capacity near the farm rich in hot water resource and thoroughly establish a water re-circulating system.
					
					 It is necessary to turn the Samchon Catfish Farm into the one biggest in production capacity and the best one which has attained the highest level in putting the fish breeding on a Juche, scientific, intensive and industrial basis among the nation's catfish farms, he noted, giving an instruction to place its production and management on intellectual, IT, digital, automated and mechanized basis at the highest level by widely introducing the successes and experience gained in the course of modernizing the Pyongyang Catfish Farm and the May 9 Catfish Farm so as to fulfill the above-said task.
					
					 He underlined the need to build an impeccable sci-tech dissemination center and cultural and welfare facilities.
					
					 He expressed hope that the officials and employees of the farm would modernize it on the world level as early as possible and drastically increase its production in a few years to come, as required by the party, by joining efforts with scientists, technicians, designers and builders of the relevant field and thus glorify the undying leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il out of his patriotism with signal success in production.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, So Hong Chan, O Su Yong and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Warns U.S. of Unimaginable Consequences to Be Entailed by Its Persistent Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Warns U.S. of Unimaginable Consequences to Be Entailed by Its Persistent Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Wednesday released the following statement in connection with the fact that the DPRK government's positive and sincere efforts for ensuring solid and lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula are facing blatant challenge of the U.S.:
					 The DPRK proposed the U.S. side to conclude a peace treaty as the most reasonable way for putting an end to the evil cycle of tension and confrontation that have lasted for more than six decades.
					
					 It is urging the conclusion of the peace treaty with the U.S. in order to put an end to the hostile policy toward the former by the latter, the root cause of all problems.
					
					 It is a clear reason everybody can understand and sympathize with that lasting peace and stability are possible on the Korean Peninsula only when the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is brought to an end and hostile relations between them are defused.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is responding to the DPRK's fair and aboveboard proposal by elaborating in action on its hostile policy already branded as "failed strategy" far from taking a sincere approach towards the proposal.
					
					 Its typical example is its recent ever more reckless moves to ratchet up "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 It is putting the armed forces, munitions and trade organs of the DPRK and their officials and even diplomats of the DPRK on the list of "sanctions." Lurking behind this action is a sinister political intention to tarnish the international image of the DPRK and make other countries feel uneasy about dealing with it and thus suffocate its overall economy including munitions industry as well as civilian field.
					
					 The U.S. authorities claim they have no hostile intent toward the DPRK whenever an opportunity presents itself but they are behaving quite contrary to their words.
					
					 The U.S. is so steeped in ill-intended repugnancy toward the DPRK that it has completely lost sense of the reality and is going reckless, unaware of who its rival is.
					
					 The U.S. row about "sanctions" would only heighten the spirit of self-reliance and increase the strenuous efforts among the workers in the field of the munitions industry of the DPRK and boost the proportion of locally available raw and other materials in its munitions industry.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently pursues its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK this way, this would only entail unimaginable consequences quite contrary to what the U.S. desires, warns the statement.

articles.title: Canada-Resident Korean Reverend Tried in DPRK
articles.content:
Canada-Resident Korean Reverend Tried in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Court of the DPRK on Wednesday held a trial on Rim Hyon Su, a Canada-resident Korean reverend who had committed the state subversive plots and activities against the DPRK, pursuant to the state-sponsored political terrorism and anti-DPRK hostile policy of the U.S. and south Korean authorities.
					 The justice examined the case of Rim Hyon Su, accused of violation of Article 60 of the DPRK Criminal Code. A written indictment verifying his crimes was submitted before an inquiry into the facts of the case.
					
					 In the course of the inquiry, the accused confessed to all heinous crimes he had committed by resorting to subversive plots and activities against the DPRK.
					
					 He malignantly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system of the DPRK out of inveterate repugnancy toward it, committed anti-DPRK religious activities, conducted false propaganda among overseas Koreans and took active part in the operation of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative group to lure and abduct DPRK citizens and in their programs for "aiding defectors from the north".
					
					 The court condemned Rim Hyon Su to a penalty of indefinite compulsory labor.

articles.title: Congratulation to PM of Saint Vincent and Grenadines
articles.content:
Congratulation to PM of Saint Vincent and Grenadines
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Ralf Gonsalves on Saturday on his reelection as prime minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished the prime minister bigger success in his work for social well-being and progress.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Kazakhstan
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Kazakhstan
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Nursultan Nazarbayev, president of Kazakhstan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Kazakhstan would vigorously develop in various fields such as politics, economy and culture and wished the president success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity and the people's well-being.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Bahrain
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Bahrain
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, king of the Kingdom of Bahrain, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Bahrain would grow stronger and sincerely wished Bahrain steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Presidents of Palestine, Nigeria Send Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Presidents of Palestine, Nigeria Send Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, and Muhammadu Buhari, president of Nigeria, sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of demise of the leader.
					 The floral baskets were placed before the statues on Wednesday.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Remember Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Remember Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Chongjin Port and Hungnam Port Wednesday in commemoration of the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin and Hamhung cities and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meetings were captains and crewmen of the Panama-flagged ship Chang Ming and Kiribati-flagged ship New Global.
					
					 Speakers said that the Korean people have held him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, adding:
					
					 Over the last 4 years humankind's reverence for him has been fully expressed at remembrance meetings, film shows and other diverse political and cultural events held in different parts of the world regardless of ideology, political view, race, language and social system.
					
					 He will always be remembered by mankind for his great contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Letters to Marshal Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties, organizations, families of Chinese and overseas Korean sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Central Council of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and those from the Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia, the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki, the Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, the Gunma Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity, the family of Zhang Wei-Hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Bao-zhong who is a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and overseas Korean Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su.
					
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Members of the WFP, WHO and FAO missions and Chinese embassy here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of the leader's demise.
					 The visitors laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by AINDF Official
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by AINDF Official
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- A vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) released a statement on Wednesday to observe the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, according to website Kuguk Jonson. 
					 The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was the sacred one of a peerlessly great man who successfully carried forward and steered to victory the cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu and the cause of national independence, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung, and the one of a peerless patriot who dedicated himself to the nation and the popular masses, the statement said, adding:
					
					 As it was led by Kim Jong Il, the north became a world-renowned military power and space power, strikingly demonstrating its dignity as the great Paektusan nation, and has firmly protected the nation and peace of the country, winning a victory after another in the fierce confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 Witnessing the eye-opening reality of the DPRK dashing toward the final victory, proudly demonstrating its  strongest national power in the world, the compatriots in the south are recollecting with deep emotion the undying exploits performed by Kim Jong Il on behalf of the country and nation, the times and history and their tremendous vitality.
					
					 His revolutionary cause of Songun and patriotic noble intention are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man acclaimed by the nation.
					
					 The AINDF will wage a more dynamic nationwide struggle to pave without fail a wide avenue to independent reunification under the uplifted banner of By Our Nation Itself and foil the moves of the U.S. and pro-U.S. conservative forces to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north and saber-rattling for invading it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Only Padded Clothing
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Only Padded Clothing
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people visits the statues of leader Kim Jong Il erected in different parts of the DPRK to pay respect to him, with the approach of the 4th anniversary of his demise (December 17).
					 Looking up to the smiling image of Kim Jong Il in his only padded clothing, they are recalling with deep emotion his great life dedicated to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 The padded clothing was the only one he had worn for over 10 years till the last moments of his life. Putting on the padded clothing, he toured a number of military units and industrial establishments across the country during the Arduous March, the force march when the country was in hard time. His padded clothing is, indeed, the eye-witness of great devotion made by him for the country and the people.
					
					 Now, the army and people of the DPRK are fully determined to materialize the lifelong wishes of Kim Jong Il at any cost under the wise leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK People Strives to Greet 7th WPK Congress with Labor Achievements
articles.content:
DPRK People Strives to Greet 7th WPK Congress with Labor Achievements
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- All the people in the DPRK have turned out in a drive for signal progress in the national economy to significantly adorn the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, which will be convened early in May 2016.
					 A great upswing is now witnessed in agriculture, fishery and light industry, coal, power, metal and all other industries.
					
					 Kim Myong Yon, chief of the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 The agricultural workers of my farm are filled with the strong will to bring a great progress in the greenhouse vegetable production through introduction of advanced cultivation methods. Such enthusiasm will produce good results in greenhouse vegetable farming next year that will see the 7th WPK Congress in May, I dare say.
					
					 Meanwhile, fishermen across the country make steady advance in fishing. The North Phyongan Provincial Fishery Management Bureau in particular has already carried out its annual production assignment for this year.
					
					 In hearty response to an appeal made by the employees of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, all the metal industrial workers, too, turned out in a drive for increased production through putting their units on a higher-level modern and scientific basis.
					
					 According to An Tok Chan, vice-minister of the Ministry of Chemical Industry, a vigorous work was launched at the chemical industrial establishments to push ahead with the modernization and localization of the chemical industry and remarkably raise the output of fertilizer and chemical products.
					
					 Such strong enthusiasm and will to greet the 7th WPK Congress, to be convened in May 2016, with great achievements can be felt everywhere in the country.

articles.title: Leading Official of Catfish Farm on Kim Jong Un's On-site Instructions
articles.content:
Leading Official of Catfish Farm on Kim Jong Un's On-site Instructions
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, recently visited the Samchon Catfish Farm and advanced a task for its modernization.
					 Touring various parts of the farm, he gave an instruction that it should be turned into a world-level catfish farm.
					
					 In this regard, a leading official of the farm told KCNA:
					
					 The task is an expression of the supreme leader's deep trust in the employees of the farm.
					
					 All the employees of the farm are now hardening their will to carry out his on-site instructions, true to his far-reaching plan for turning the farm into the biggest one in the country.
					
					 We will surely finish the huge project for the farm's modernization until the anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (Oct. 10) next year when its 7th Congress is to be convened, and turn out much more catfish.
					
					 The 7th WPK Congress is to be held early in May Juche 105 (2016).

articles.title: Many Famous Songs Created in 2015
articles.content:
Many Famous Songs Created in 2015
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- This year has witnessed a number of songs popular among servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK, who glorified the 70th anniversaries of the national liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) as a grand festival of victors.
					 Songs "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" and "Let's Not Abandon Revolutionary Faith Though One May Die" have created a public response, instilling the revolutionary enthusiasm into all the people. These songs can be heard from different parts of the country as it fully represents the spirit of Kim Jong Un's era and encourages them to make achievements in their efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 New popular songs also include "Everlasting Echo", "Three Years-long War" and "Mother's Birthday", which vividly show the struggle and life of the Korean people and their aspiration and hope.
					
					 On the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, there took place a joint performance given by the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band, an art performance by the Chongbong Band and the 10 000-strong art performance "Great Party, Rosy Korea".
					
					 The artistes of the Korean People's Army have taken the lead in the activities to create enthusiastic music and art works.
					
					 In August this year when the situation on the Korean Peninsula was led to the brink of war, the State Merited Chorus inspired all the army and people of the DPRK to defending the country and speeding up the building of the thriving nation through its frontline performances. And the chorus reproduced the song "We'll Travel One Road Forever" with orchestral music and male chorus to be a masterpiece of national treasure in October.
					
					 The Moranbong Band has also played an important role in encouraging the army and people to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Among songs the band created and put on the stage were "His Humanity" and "We Will Follow You Forever".
					
					 All the songs created this year are giving a strong impetus to the campaign of the Korean people to significantly greet with unprecedented labor achievements the 7th Congress of the WPK to be held early in May 2016.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Arms Buildup in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Arms Buildup in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently announced that it would dispatch to south Korea over 4,500 troops of the first armored brigade under the first cavalry division in Fort Hood, Texas, under the pretext of the regular rotation deployment.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said U.S. forces deployment goes to prove that the U.S. remains unchanged in its hostile policy towards the DPRK and is rushing for a war against it.
					
					 The U.S. often pays lip-service to "ensuring peace and detente" on the Korean Peninsula whenever a chance presents itself, but behaves quite contrary to its words in practice.
					
					 It is the strategic purpose of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and the U.S. has systematically reinforced its forces in south Korea since long ago in a bid to attain the purpose.
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that it can easily carry out its pivot to Asia-Pacific policy only when it contains the DPRK militarily and put the whole of Korea under its control.
					
					 What the U.S. seeks is not to ensure peace on the peninsula but to unilaterally disarm the DPRK.
					
					 One may conclude that the U.S. attempt to forward-deploy its combat forces based in its mainland in south Korea is premised on the use of force against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is loudmouthed about "ensuring peace" on the peninsula, but the reality clearly proves what it wants is a war and it is, therefore, the arch criminal escalating the tension on the peninsula and the enemy of peace.
					
					 The U.S. is harboring a foolish daydream, utterly ignorant of who its rival is.
					
					 It is a pipedream to disarm the DPRK and bring it down by force of arms.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Unreasonable Trial Targeting Chongryon
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Unreasonable Trial Targeting Chongryon
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Kyoto District Court of Japan held a trial of an official of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a Korean in Japan and an enterprise who were arrested on charge of violation of the "law on foreign exchange".
					 The court passed an entirely unreasonable judgment on them as expected.
					
					 Minju Joson on Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The court gave the verdict of guilty, away from independence and impartiality of judicature.
					
					 This was a direct product of the deep-rooted bitterness toward the DPRK and Chongryon and an unprecedented fascist tyranny.
					
					 This trial was a politically-motivated deliberate farce staged by the Japanese reactionaries against Chongryon.
					
					 The court's ruling was a nonsensical far-fetched assertion and sheer sophism.
					
					 As the DPRK emphasized more than once, Chongryon is a legitimate and dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK.
					
					 That's why the Japanese reactionaries' suppression of Chongryon was an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the Japanese reactionaries' wicked political suppression of Koreans in Japan and Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should not misjudge the Korean people's hatred toward Japan but retract at once the unreasonable decision against the official of Chongryon, Korean in Japan and the enterprise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Switzerland, Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Switzerland, Germany
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- There took place a remembrance meeting in Switzerland and a round-table talks in Germany on Dec. 4 and 5 in the run-up to the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said Kim Jong Il made undying contributions to the cause of reunifying the country independently free from outsiders' interference by providing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, true to the behest of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made a ceaseless journey to meet the people and servicepersons throughout the country.
					
					 His forced march for field guidance shows how warm his loving care for the people and servicepersons was.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the remembrance meeting in Switzerland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Serbia, Tanzania and Nigeria from Dec. 5 to 10 in the run-up to the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party in Serbia noted:
					
					 The whole life of Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, was a noble life of a genuine revolutionary and a great leader who devoted himself to the victory of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 He devoted himself to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and resolutely foiled the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the DPRK has turned into a socialist state protecting the interest of the popular masses and an invincible power emerging victorious in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The world progressives pay the highest tribute to him.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups and other personages praised Kim Jong Il for frustrating the imperialists' moves for stifling the DPRK and firmly defending the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world by pursuing the Songun politics.

articles.title: Foreign Media Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
articles.content:
Foreign Media Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Cambodian media observed the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 2 and 3. 
					 SANA carried his portrait. It said that Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to the future of Korea.
					
					 He advanced all the lines and policies on the principle of giving priority to the future of the country, looking far ahead into the future, and wisely led the country despite the U.S. persistent threat, blockade and sanctions.
					
					 He made a ceaseless journey for field guidance for the country and its people all his life, it noted.
					
					 F.M.90.5 Radio of Cambodia said that four years have passed since Kim Jong Il passed away, during which the Korean people have missed him, remaining loyal to him out of their noble moral obligation.
					
					 The radio aired that the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leaders has been successfully realized on the highest level. 
					
					 Apsara TV and Radio of Cambodia also aired a similar program.

articles.title: Book "Kim Jong Un, Politics of Love for People" Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Book "Kim Jong Un, Politics of Love for People" Published in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, December 16 (KCNA) -- A book "Kim Jong Un, Politics of Love for People" was published in Bangladesh on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 A book releasing ceremony took place in Dhaka on December 7.
					
					 Present there were personages of political parties and organizations and masses of Bangladesh, the DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh and his embassy officials.
					
					 Speeches were made by Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu, general secretary of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, and M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy who authored the book.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Un for pursuing his lofty politics of love for the people. They expressed their will to work hard to make more people know about the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 They called for more actively conducting the movement for solidarity with the Korean people who are dynamically accelerating the building of a thriving nation despite the imperialists' persistent moves for stifling the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Siluros de Samchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Siluros de Samchon
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de la Fabrica de Siluros de Samchon y presento una tarea de convertirla en una fabrica de siluros de talla mundial donde se perfeccionan en nivel maximo la jucheanizacion, la cientifizacion, la intensificacion y la industrializacion.
					Estuvo primero en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Senalo que la unidad fue una empresa levantada durante la Marcha Penosa y la forzada por la iniciativa y minuciosa atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y fue una de las herencias patrioticas dejadas por el.
					
					Al recordar con gran emocion aquel dia cuando el Mariscal estaba junto con el Dirigente en esta fabrica, dijo que le viene a la memoria la imagen afectuosa del Dirigente que estuvo muy contento por haber preparado las condiciones para suministrar los siluros sabrosos y nutritivos a los militares y los habitantes.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica deben producir mucho mas pescados sin olvidar ni un momento el noble deseo del Dirigente y, de esta manera, glorificar sus hazanas de la direccion del Dirigente.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de sus actividades de produccion y gestion y presento las tareas de convertirla en la fabrica de talla mundial.
					
					Enfatizo en que la region de la fabrica es una zona de fuente termal mas reconocida en el pais, razon por la cual es un lugar ideal para criar los siluros, pez de agua caliente, y menciono la necesidad de convertir la fabrica en una base de produccion de siluros de talla mundial.
					
					Refirio que a base del calculo economico y cientifico hay que desarrollar una operacion audaz y ambiciosa para consolidar la base material y tecnica de la fabrica incluyendo la obra de construir mas la sala de incubacion y los criaderos bajo techo y al aire libre para incrementar mas que la actualidad la capacidad productiva de la fabrica y acondicionar una moderna base de produccion de pienso Phaenghwa.
					
					Hablo de la necesidad de construir la nueva represa de gran capacidad en el alrededor de la fabrica con abundante fuente de termal y establecer un estricto sistema de recirculacion de agua.
					
					Subrayo que tienen que convertir la fabrica en la empresa con maximo nivel en la capacidad productiva y en el nivel de la jucheanizacion, la cientifizacion, la intensificacion y la industrializacion entre los fabricas de siluro del pais y subrayo que para este fin se necesita aplicar de modo activo los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en los procesos de realizar la modernizacion en la Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang y la otra 9 de Mayo y realizar al maximo el funcionamiento sensitivo y cognoscitivo, la informatizacion, la digitalizacion, la automatizacion y la mecanizacion.
					
					Recalco que hay que acondicionar perfectamente la base de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas y los establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico.
					
					Estimulo a los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica diciendo que conforme a las tareas dadas por el partido ellos realizaran lo mas pronto posible la modernizacion de la fabrica en el nivel mundial cooperando con los cientificos, tecnicos, disenadores y constructores de las ramas correspondientes e incrementaran bruscamente la cantidad productiva del siluro en unos anos, glorificando asi las inmortales hazanas de la direccion del Dirigente.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, So Hong Chan, O Su Yong y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Condenada a Rim Hyon Su pena de trabajo reeducativo ilimitado
articles.content:
Condenada a Rim Hyon Su pena de trabajo reeducativo ilimitado
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Tribunal Supremo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el juicio sobre Rim Hyon Su, pastor coreano residente en Canada, detenido por sus intrigas de derrocamiento de la RPDC.
					A la ocasion asistieron en calidad de observadores las masas de distintos estratos, compatriotas en ultramar quienes permanecen en la patria socialista y los extranjeros.
					
					Se presento el acta de acusacion que confirma el hecho de crimen despues de examinar el registro del incidente de Rim, acusado quien corresponde al articulo 60 del codigo penal de la RPDC (crimen de complot de derrocamiento de Estado) y se  realizo la investigacion de hecho.
					
					En tal proceso el acusado Rim reconocio todos los hechos criminales de que calumnio e insulto atrozmente la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC sumandose al acto hostil anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas e intento derrocar la RPDC.
					
					A continuacion, se presentaron las palabras de los testigos y las materias de prueba que confirman el crimen del acusado.
					
					En la argumentacion, el fiscal propuso al presente juicio condenar a muerte al acusado, diciendo que el crimen de Rim que se atrevio a calumniar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y violo la seguridad del regimen socialista y el Estado, debe ser sometido merecidamente al castigo severo segun la ley de la RPDC.
					
					El abogado, en su alegato, sugirio al presente juicio condenarle no a la muerte propuesta por la parte de acusacion sino otra pena, para que el acusado presencie personalmente el aspecto verdadero de la patria reunificada y la prospera nacion del sol aunque son muy graves sus crimenes y consecuencias.
					
					En el juicio se condeno al acusado Rim Hyon Su la pena de trabajo reeducativo ilimitado.
					
					El presente juicio volvio a demostrar claramente que tragico destino corresponde a Rim Hyon Su y otros criminales que se suman a las maniobras de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas que se desesperan para desacreditar la maxima dignidad de la sagrada RPDC y eliminar el regimen socialista, terreno de vida verdadera del pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Bahrein

Kim Yong Nam felicita Dia Nacional de Bahrein
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 16 un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Bahrein, Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Kazajstan

Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Kazajstan
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 16 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Kazajstan, Nursultan Nazarbayev, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais.

articles.title: Fabrica de Siluros de Samchon se modernizara a nivel mundial
articles.content:
Fabrica de Siluros de Samchon se modernizara a nivel mundial
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la Fabrica de Siluros de Samchon, visitada recientemente por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, reina un impetu revolucionario.
					Recorriendo varios lugares de la fabrica, el Mariscal presento la tarea de convertirla en una empresa de talla mundial.
					
					Informado de la instruccion del Mariscal, un funcionario directivo de la fabrica expreso su decision a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					En nuestra fabrica el estimado Mariscal se cercioro en detalles del estado de produccion y administracion y presento las tareas necesarias a convertirla en la fabrica de siluros de talla mundial. Esto deviene una gran confianza del Mariscal en nuestros obreros.
					
					Ahora, los obreros de nuestra fabrica estan decididos a registrar proezas laborales en realizar el grandioso proyecto del Mariscal de construir en el pais otra gran fabrica de siluros.
					
					Completaremos incondicionalmente la inmensa obra para modernizar la fabrica hasta el 10 de octubre de 2016, ano significativo en que se convocara el Septimo Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y asi materializaremos con fidelidad el noble proposito del Mariscal con la produccion cuantiosa de siluros.
					
					El Septimo Congreso del PTC, que servira de un acontecimiento a ser registrado especialmente en los anales del partido, se convocara a principios de mayo del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia juicio publico de reaccionarios japoneses contra Chongryon
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia juicio publico de reaccionarios japoneses contra Chongryon
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el tribunal local de Kyoto de Japon llevo al juicio a un funcionario de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), compatriota y empresa, detenidos y acusados bajo la sospecha de la violacion de la supuesta "ley de divisas" y les dicto injusta sentencia como ya suponemos.
					La sentencia condenatoria del tribunal local de Kyoto que abandono por si mismo la autonomia y la imparcialidad de la judicatura, deviene el producto directo de la conciencia hostil y la represion fascista sin precedente de los reaccionarios contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Chongryon.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					La presente farsa es el complot politico inventado intencionalmente por los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon.
					
					La sentencia condenatoria dictada por el tribunal es la obstinacion inaceptable a nadie y la sofisteria descarada.
					
					Como ya subrayamos en varias ocasiones, la Chongryon es la legitima y digna entidad de ciudadanos en ultramar de la RPDC.
					
					Por esta razon las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses tendentes a eliminar la Chongryon es la provocacion politica imperdonable contra la RPDC.
					
					Nunca estaremos con brazos cruzados ante la vil represion politica de los reaccionarios japoneses contra los compatriotas residentes en Japon y la Chongryon.
					
					Los reaccionarios nipones no deben juzgar mal la enemistad del pueblo coreano contra ellos mismos sino revocar la sentencia injusta dictada al funcionario de la Chongryon, compatriota y empresa.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta refuerzo de fuerzas armadas de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta refuerzo de fuerzas armadas de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 16 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos anuncio un plan de enviar al Sur de Corea mas de 4 mil 500 uniformados de la primera brigada blindada de la primera division de caballeria estacionada en Port Food de Texas bajo el rotulo del regular emplazamiento circulatorio. 
					En un comentario individual de hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que esto demuestra que EE.UU. no cambio ni en lo minimo su politica hostil a RPDC y persigue la guerra de agresion a esta, y continua:
					
					El imperio suele hablar de la "seguridad de paz" y el "alivio de tension" de la Peninsula Coreana, pero sus acciones reales son completamente diferentes.
					
					Aplastar la RPDC con las fuerzas es la meta estrategica del imperio y para ese fin Estados Unidos vino incrementando sistematicamente desde hace mucho tiempo sus efectivos en Sur de Corea.
					
					El imperio esta calculando que podra realizar facilmente la politica de dar prioridad a Asia y el Pacifico solo cuando toma en su mano toda Corea aplastando militarmente la RPDC.
					
					El pais norteamericano no desea el aseguramiento de paz de la Peninsula Coreana, sino el desarme unilateral de la RPDC.
					
					El plan arriba mencionado tiene como premisa el uso de la fuerza contra la RPDC.
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que a diferencia de su pronunciacion frecuente sobre "aseguramiento" de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. desea en realidad la guerra y es responsable del empeoramiento de situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y enemigo de la paz.
					
					EE.UU. esta en el sueno muy absurdo sin saber nada a su contraparte.
					
					No pasa de ser una vana ilusion el intento de desarmar a la RPDC y atentarla con las fuerzas armadas.
